title: Program Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at SARAH Inc. (North Haven, CT) in Oct 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was interesting. I met with the Director and Manager in the kitchen. The manager was somewhat prepared but had to keep leaving to get paperwork from the copier. The manager had me complete a writing assessment and asked a few questions. Overall the facility was nice.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your previous employment? Scenario questions

title: Developmental Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at SARAH Inc. (New Haven, CT) in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: Informal and warm , staff was easy to talk to. Answered questions truthfully and in detail. Two interviewers on a video chat. App was easy to use. Interview took about an hour

title: Sales Consultant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at SARAH Inc.
Interview Descriptions: Easy and efficient, they were friendly and understood that skills needed can be learned from a large variety of previous jobs, hobbies, etc. I felt very comfortable and like I was just sitting round having a good old chat with them.
Interview Questions: Why do you feel you would suit this position?

title: Sales Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at SARAH Inc. (New York, NY) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview was short and she was lovely she told me about the job and I told her about my experiences . I don’t know what is going to happen next afternoon phone interview I just want to read the reviews

title: Leadership Development Program Interview
Interview Descriptions: I talked to two representatives and up to 15 minutes each one. They are fun and friendly! One situational interview and a behavior interview. The program is very competitive.  They will also give you lots of suggestions for your career.

title: Business Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at SARAH Inc. (New York, NY) in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions: the interview took 2 days in total, one for the phone interview and another for the one on one interview. THe HR was very prompt in getting back to me and readily answered my questions even after the interview. The experience was enjoyable and the interview was very efficient.
Interview Questions: Describe a typical day at your last job

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at SARAH Inc. (New York, NY) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: It took 30 minutes their were other I interviewed with a couple managers maybe 2 or 3 each 1 always had a little something different to say overall it wasn't stressful at all

title: Direct Support Professional Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 days. I interviewed at SARAH Inc. (North Haven, CT) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions: Fairly general interview. They ask the same questions every time. It was a three person panel interview (HR, and two program managers). They asked STAR questions as well as the usual "tell me about yourself"
